Class R_NodeImpl

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.R_NodeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SonarObject, R_Node, Storable
public class R_NodeImpl extends BaseObjectImpl implements R_Node
R_NodeImpl is an implementation of the R_Node interface. Each object of this class represents one node on the roadway network.
Author:
Douglas Lau, Michael Darter

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.BaseObjectImpl
